associateexternalconnection.name: AssociateExternalConnection
associateexternalconnection.description: Grants permission to add an external connection to a repository

associatewithdownstreamrepository.name: AssociateWithDownstreamRepository
associatewithdownstreamrepository.description: Grants permission to associate an existing repository as an upstream repository to another repository

copypackageversions.name: CopyPackageVersions
copypackageversions.description: Grants permission to copy package versions from one repository to another repository in the same domain

createdomain.name: CreateDomain
createdomain.description: Grants permission to create a new domain

createpackagegroup.name: CreatePackageGroup
createpackagegroup.description: Grants permission to create a package group

createrepository.name: CreateRepository
createrepository.description: Grants permission to create a new repository

deletedomain.name: DeleteDomain
deletedomain.description: Grants permission to delete a domain

deletedomainpermissionspolicy.name: DeleteDomainPermissionsPolicy
deletedomainpermissionspolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the resource policy set on a domain

deletepackage.name: DeletePackage
deletepackage.description: Grants permission to delete a package

deletepackagegroup.name: DeletePackageGroup
deletepackagegroup.description: Grants permission to delete a package group

deletepackageversions.name: DeletePackageVersions
deletepackageversions.description: Grants permission to delete package versions

deleterepository.name: DeleteRepository
deleterepository.description: Grants permission to delete a repository

deleterepositorypermissionspolicy.name: DeleteRepositoryPermissionsPolicy
deleterepositorypermissionspolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the resource policy set on a repository

describedomain.name: DescribeDomain
describedomain.description: Grants permission to return information about a domain

describepackage.name: DescribePackage
describepackage.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a package

describepackagegroup.name: DescribePackageGroup
describepackagegroup.description: Grants permission to return detailed information about a package group

describepackageversion.name: DescribePackageVersion
describepackageversion.description: Grants permission to return information about a package version

describerepository.name: DescribeRepository
describerepository.description: Grants permission to return detailed information about a repository

disassociateexternalconnection.name: DisassociateExternalConnection
disassociateexternalconnection.description: Grants permission to disassociate an external connection from a repository

disposepackageversions.name: DisposePackageVersions
disposepackageversions.description: Grants permission to set the status of package versions to Disposed and delete their assets

getassociatedpackagegroup.name: GetAssociatedPackageGroup
getassociatedpackagegroup.description: Grants permission to return a package's associated package group

getauthorizationtoken.name: GetAuthorizationToken
getauthorizationtoken.description: Grants permission to generate a temporary authentication token for accessing repositories in a domain

getdomainpermissionspolicy.name: GetDomainPermissionsPolicy
getdomainpermissionspolicy.description: Grants permission to return a domain's resource policy

getpackageversionasset.name: GetPackageVersionAsset
getpackageversionasset.description: Grants permission to return an asset (or file) that is part of a package version

getpackageversionreadme.name: GetPackageVersionReadme
getpackageversionreadme.description: Grants permission to return a package version's readme file

getrepositoryendpoint.name: GetRepositoryEndpoint
getrepositoryendpoint.description: Grants permission to return an endpoint for a repository

getrepositorypermissionspolicy.name: GetRepositoryPermissionsPolicy
getrepositorypermissionspolicy.description: Grants permission to return a repository's resource policy

listallowedrepositoriesforgroup.name: ListAllowedRepositoriesForGroup
listallowedrepositoriesforgroup.description: Grants permission to list the allowed repositories for a package group

listassociatedpackages.name: ListAssociatedPackages
listassociatedpackages.description: Grants permission to list the packages associated to a package group

listdomains.name: ListDomains
listdomains.description: Grants permission to list the domains in the current user's AWS account

listpackagegroups.name: ListPackageGroups
listpackagegroups.description: Grants permission to list the package groups in a domain

listpackageversionassets.name: ListPackageVersionAssets
listpackageversionassets.description: Grants permission to list a package version's assets

listpackageversiondependencies.name: ListPackageVersionDependencies
listpackageversiondependencies.description: Grants permission to list the direct dependencies of a package version

listpackageversions.name: ListPackageVersions
listpackageversions.description: Grants permission to list a package's versions

listpackages.name: ListPackages
listpackages.description: Grants permission to list the packages in a repository

listrepositories.name: ListRepositories
listrepositories.description: Grants permission to list the repositories administered by the calling account

listrepositoriesindomain.name: ListRepositoriesInDomain
listrepositoriesindomain.description: Grants permission to list the repositories in a domain

listsubpackagegroups.name: ListSubPackageGroups
listsubpackagegroups.description: Grants permission to list the sub package groups for a parent package group

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a CodeArtifact resource

publishpackageversion.name: PublishPackageVersion
publishpackageversion.description: Grants permission to publish assets and metadata to a repository endpoint

putdomainpermissionspolicy.name: PutDomainPermissionsPolicy
putdomainpermissionspolicy.description: Grants permission to attach a resource policy to a domain

putpackagemetadata.name: PutPackageMetadata
putpackagemetadata.description: Grants permission to add, modify or remove package metadata using a repository endpoint

putpackageoriginconfiguration.name: PutPackageOriginConfiguration
putpackageoriginconfiguration.description: Grants permission to set origin configuration for a package

putrepositorypermissionspolicy.name: PutRepositoryPermissionsPolicy
putrepositorypermissionspolicy.description: Grants permission to attach a resource policy to a repository

readfromrepository.name: ReadFromRepository
readfromrepository.description: Grants permission to return package assets and metadata from a repository endpoint

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag a CodeArtifact resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from a CodeArtifact resource

updatepackagegroup.name: UpdatePackageGroup
updatepackagegroup.description: Grants permission to modify the properties of a package group

updatepackagegrouporiginconfiguration.name: UpdatePackageGroupOriginConfiguration
updatepackagegrouporiginconfiguration.description: Grants permission to modify the package origin configuration of a package group

updatepackageversionsstatus.name: UpdatePackageVersionsStatus
updatepackageversionsstatus.description: Grants permission to modify the status of one or more versions of a package

updaterepository.name: UpdateRepository
updaterepository.description: Grants permission to modify the properties of a repository
